rules.name: Indomitable Heroes
rules.lore: Gathered into a powerful formation known as a lance, Imperial Knights and the Nobles who pilot them wage their honor-driven assaults with renowned resilience and bloody-minded determination
rules.text: All +Imperial Knights models from your army have the !Feel No Pain 6+! ability. If your army is Honored, those models have the !Feel No Pain 5+! ability instead.

strategems.name: Shoulder the Burden
strategems.when: Upon Activation of a friendly unit
strategems.effect: Until the end of the Battle Round, your unit's Movement, Toughness, Armor Save, Leadership, and Objective Control traits are improved by 1, and it has +1 to all Hit rolls.

upgrades.name: Knightly Reverence
upgrades.text: Your +Imperial Knights+ units within 6" of another +Imperial Knights+ unit have their Leadership trait improved by 1. If your army is Honored, the range of this ability is increased to 12".

upgrades.name: Unyielding Paragon
upgrades.text: Attacks made against your +Questoris+ units have their Armor Break trait worsened by 1.

upgrades.name: Mythic Heroes
upgrades.text: Your Bondsman abilities may be applied to two +Armiger+ units at a time instead of just one. Units are still limited to being affected by one Bondsman ability at a time.
